title: Pool Pump Replacement - Pool A
description: Main pool pump motor failure. 10-year-old Pentair unit needs full replacement including motor housing and controller. Pool currently closed.

title: Rooftop HVAC Unit #3 Repair
description: Compressor failure on RTU-3 serving floors 18-25 common corridors. Freon leak detected. Full compressor replacement required.

title: Parking Garage Sealant & Restriping
description: Levels P1 and P2 expansion joint sealant failing. Water infiltration noted. Restripe all 400 parking stalls after sealant repair.

title: Elevator #4 Cab Refurbishment
description: Elevator cab #4 interior panels warped and lighting outdated. Complete cab interior renovation including LED lighting mirrors and new panel finish.

title: Fire Suppression System Annual Inspection
description: Required annual fire suppression system inspection and testing per NFPA 25. All heads risers and backflows to be inspected and tested.

title: Lobby Flooring Restoration
description: Main lobby marble flooring showing wear and etching in high traffic zones. Diamond polishing and sealing required on approximately 3200 sqft.

title: Building Exterior Pressure Wash
description: Annual exterior facade pressure wash for all 42 floors. Salt air and mold build-up on balcony soffits and window frames. Swing stage required.

title: Generator Load Bank Test
description: Annual load bank test on 200kW backup generator per Miami-Dade requirements. Full 4-hour test at rated load with transfer switch test.

title: Common Corridor Carpet Replacement - Floors 1-10
description: Common corridor carpet on floors 1-10 showing significant wear at 8 years old. Replace with commercial-grade nylon in approved building color.

title: Pool Deck Resurfacing
description: Pool deck surface coating peeling in several sections. Apply Kool Deck resurfacing to entire 8000 sqft pool deck area.

title: Gym Equipment Replacement
description: Treadmills and ellipticals in fitness center exceed useful life (12 years). Replace 8 treadmills 6 ellipticals and 4 stationary bikes.
